scripts.backend-peer: export HTTP_PORT=4001 && export P2P_PORT=6001 && export PRIVATE_KEY=peer1 && node server/app.js
scripts.backend-peer2: export HTTP_PORT=4002 && export P2P_PORT=6002 && export PRIVATE_KEY=peer2 &&  node server/app.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.dev-peer: concurrently "npm run backend-peer" "npm run front-peer --prefix client"
scripts.dev-peer2: concurrently "npm run backend-peer2" "npm run front-peer2 --prefix client"
